name: Paris, France
description: The capital of France, known for its art, fashion, gastronomy, and culture. Its 19th-century cityscape is crisscrossed by wide boulevards and the River Seine.
best_time_to_visit: Spring (April-June) and Fall (September-October) offer pleasant weather and fewer crowds.

attractions.name: Eiffel Tower
attractions.info: An iconic iron lattice tower. Visitors can go to the top for panoramic views. It's best to book tickets online in advance to avoid long queues.

attractions.name: Louvre Museum
attractions.info: The world's largest art museum and a historic monument. It is home to masterpieces like the Mona Lisa and the Venus de Milo.

name: Tokyo, Japan
description: Japanâ€™s bustling capital, mixes the ultramodern and the traditional, from neon-lit skyscrapers to historic temples.
best_time_to_visit: Spring (March-April) for cherry blossoms and Autumn (October-November) for cool temperatures and autumn colors.

attractions.name: Shibuya Crossing
attractions.info: One of the busiest intersections in the world. An amazing spectacle of pedestrian traffic, best viewed from the second floor of the nearby Starbucks.

attractions.name: Senso-ji Temple
attractions.info: Tokyo's oldest temple, located in Asakusa. The approach to the temple, known as Nakamise-dori, is lined with traditional shops.
